descriptionHtml:
Dies sind eine wörtliche und eine sinngemäße Übersetzung der Mod von Hayk94.

Im Download enthalten sind alle benötigten Dateien,

darunter die Texturen von OmnielMachia.

Alternative Texturen: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5393/?

Endorsed bitte auf deren Seiten.
_____________________________________________________________________________

Da ich das Sprachgemisch im 'gemoddeten' Skyrim leid bin, habe ich mich

entschlossen Abhilfe zu schaffen und die bisher noch nicht deutschen,

von mir genutzten Mods zu übersetzen.


EI.esp		-->	Inkarnation des Bösen.esp

 wörtlich
Evil Arrow	-->	Böser Pfeil
Evil Boots	-->	Böse Stiefel
Evil Armor	-->	Böse Rüstung
Evil Gauntlets	-->	Böse Panzerhandschuhe
Evil Helmet	-->	Böser Helm
Evil Shield	-->	Böser Schild

 lore-friendly
Evil Arrow	-->	Daedrischer Pfeil des Bösen
Evil Boots	-->	Daedrische Stiefel des Bösen
Evil Armor	-->	Daedrische Rüstung des Bösen
Evil Gauntlets	-->	Daedrische Panzerhandschuhe des Bösen
Evil Helmet	-->	Daedrischer Helm des Bösen
Evil Shield	-->	Daedrischer Schild des Bösen


-Original wird nicht benötigt-
_____________________________________________________________________________
_____________________________________________________________________________

Evil Incarnate Armor
Version 0.0.2

1.Description
2.Installation
3.Uninstallation
4.Credits
5.Permissions
6.Changelog

1.Description
Thanks for downloading ,please endorse this mod if you like it.
This is a standalone version of OmnielMachia's daedric armor retexture.
Here is the original mod which replaces the vanilla daedric armor. http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3395
This mod won't replace the vanilla armor it will add a new one.
To get the armor you must have Daedric Smithing perk, so that you can craft it.Also now you can upgrade it.To craft for example the cuirass you must have Daedric cuirass, 2 ebony,2 heart of daedra.The armor rating is more than daedric armors rating, so it is kind of upgrade for the daedric armor.
Or to get the Evil armor simply open the console with "~" ingame
Then type 
<< player.additem XX001005 1 >> to get Evil Boots *
<< player.additem XX001007 1 >> to get Evil Gauntlets *
<< player.additem XX001008 1 >> to get Evil Helmet *
<< player.additem XX001006 1 >> to get Evil Cuirass *
<< player.additem XX001009 1 >> to get Evil Shield *
<< player.additem XX010014 1 >> to get Evil Arrow *
* XX is the Load Order value of the .esp file. NMM tells you what that value is, simply by going to the plugins tab. 

2.Installation
Extract EI.rar into <Skyrim dir>\Data\
 Then open Skyrim Launcher go to Data files activate EI.esp

OR

Use Nexus Mod Manager

3.Uninstallation
Delete EI.esp
Go to meshes\armor\daedric\ delete Evil Incarnate folder
Go to textures\armor\daedric\ delete Evil Incarnate folder

4.Credits
OmnielMachia
Hayk94

5.Permissions
You must ask permission from me and OmnielMachia before using these mod/textures.

6.Changelog

0.0.2
Armor now is craftable
Armor now is upgradeable
Armor rating is increased
Added quivers retexture standalone,(a new arrow with increased damage)

0.0.1
Intial release.
author: Peisithanatos
